casebody.data:
Berwind White Coal Mining Company, Libelant-Appellant, v. Steamship MONTSERRAT, Her Engines, etc.; Compania Trasatlantica, Claimant-Appellee; James Auditore & Sons, Inc., Respondent-Appellee. (Circuit Court of Appeals, Second Circuit. November 1, 1926.) No. 48. Gerald J. McKeman and Maeklin,. Brown & Yan Wyck, all of New York City, for appellant. Hunt, Hill & Betts, of New York City (John W. Crandall, of New York City, of counsel), for appellee.

Before HOUGH, MANTON, and MACK, Circuit Judges.

PER CURIAM.

Decree (7 F.[2d] 477) affirmed, with costs.
